name: Valentine’s Day Hearts
author: Digitally Cultured

sections.description: When the plugin is activated, the front end of your site will have floating hearts to help spread love!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Turn on the floating hearts in the Appearance | Floating Hearts menu page
  4. Spread the love!
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • Add: new configuration page, found in the Appearance menu, called Floating Hearts
  • Add: ability to turn on/off the display of the hearts on the front end of your site
  • Edit: force the heart to use color scheme by changing CSS class & adding !important to CSS styles

1.0

  • Plugin created and added to repository
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Turn on the floating hearts in the Appearance | Floating Hearts menu page
  4. Spread the love!

short_description: Simple plugin to give a touch of Valentine's Day spirit!
description: When the plugin is activated, the front end of your site will have floating hearts to help spread love!

screenshots.caption: Spread the love on Valentine's Day!
